entry.data:
CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG THIS EVENING, THEN AREAS OF FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
WIDESPREAD FOG IN THE MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
